!Trader Holly: Welcome to our store, sir. Are you enjoying your visit to the capital of Aden? m you're selling is inexpensive, it would be simpler to sell it to a store directly. Although outwardly it appears stable and secure, this place has some complicated problems. Some aristocrats and military cliques are conspiring to seize the throne. Unless we rid our country of them quickly, they will be our downfall... Oh well, what do I know? I am just an ignorant old woman. Forget what I just said. Step this way, sir.
